pkgmetadata.longdescription: # SpeechtotextPython package to benchmark speech2text models. ## DocumentationThe documentation can be found [here](https://jarneamerlinck.github.io/speechtotext/)## Install package### Python```bashpip install speechtotext-python```### Conda ```yamlname: sample_envchannels:dependencies: - python<3.11,>=3.9.2 - pip - pip: - speechtotext-python```
